column1: Little Goat Diner////The two stars is for the service. Our food was a greasy mess. The omelette had a brown crispness like it was fried in an inch of grease. Daughter had CB hash & eggs. The hash had dry salty corned beef on the bottom
column2: next layer shredded potatoes that were all crisp
column3: no regular potato just shredded of brown crisp. Egg was greasy as well. Even the cookie from the bakery
column5: was flavorless except for the cherries. All that for $40. Never again.
